verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God בְּקָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> in his sanctuary הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> praise בִּרְקִ֥יעַ <S%H7549><s%> him in the firmament עֻזּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5797><s%> of his power

הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise בִגְבוּרֹתָ֑יו <S%H1369><s%> him for his mighty acts הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> praise כְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> him according to his excellent גֻּדְלֽוֹ׃ <S%H1433><s%> greatness

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise בְּתֵ֣קַע <S%H8629><s%> him with the sound שׁוֹפָ֑ר <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> praise בְּנֵ֣בֶל <S%H5035><s%> him with the psaltery וְכִנּֽוֹר׃ <S%H3658><s%> and harp

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise בְתֹ֣ף <S%H8596><s%> him with the timbrel וּמָח֑וֹל <S%H4234><s%> and dance הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> praise בְּמִנִּ֥ים <S%H4482><s%> him with stringed instruments וְעוּגָֽב׃ <S%H5748><s%> and organs

הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise בְצִלְצְלֵי־ <S%H6767><s%> cymbals שָׁ֑מַע <S%H8088><s%> him upon the loud הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> praise בְּֽצִלְצְלֵ֥י <S%H6767><s%> cymbals תְרוּעָֽה׃ <S%H8643><s%> him upon the high sounding

כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> everything הַ֭נְּשָׁמָה <S%H5397><s%> Let every thing that hath breath תְּהַלֵּ֥ל <S%H1984><s%> praise יָ֗הּ <S%H3050><s%> the LORD הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD
